com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker

Class Run

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker.Run

  • public class Run
extends Object
    A class representing a single run being tracked by this application.
    Author:
    Bill Phillips, Brian Hardy, ajkwak@users.noreply.github.com (AJ Parmidge)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Run()
      Creates a new Run with an invalid ID.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String formatDuration(int durationSeconds)
      Formats the given run duration as an easily human-readable string with the format HH:MM:SS (where HH is the number of hours in the run, MM is the number of minutes in the run, and SS is the number of seconds in the run).
      int getDurationSeconds(long endMillis)
      Gets the duration of this run, in milliseconds, with the given run end time.
      long getId()
      Gets the ID of this run.
      Date getStartDate()
      Gets the start date of this run.
      void setId(long id)
      Sets the unique ID of this run to the given value.
      void setStartDate(Date startDate)
      Sets the start date of this run to the given value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Run

        public Run()
        Creates a new Run with an invalid ID. By default, the start date of the newly created run is set to the time at which this constructor is called.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Gets the ID of this run.
        Returns:
        the ID of this run

      • setId

        public void setId(long id)
        Sets the unique ID of this run to the given value.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID to set

      • getStartDate

        public Date getStartDate()
        Gets the start date of this run.
        Returns:
        the start date of this run

        public void setStartDate(Date startDate)
        Sets the start date of this run to the given value.
        Parameters:
        startDate - the start date to set

      • getDurationSeconds

        public int getDurationSeconds(long endMillis)
        Gets the duration of this run, in milliseconds, with the given run end time.
        Parameters:
        endMillis - the end time of the run (in millisecods)
        Returns:
        the duration of the run (in milliseconds)

      • formatDuration

        public static String formatDuration(int durationSeconds)
        Formats the given run duration as an easily human-readable string with the format HH:MM:SS (where HH is the number of hours in the run, MM is the number of minutes in the run, and SS is the number of seconds in the run).
        Parameters:
        durationSeconds - the duration of the run, in seconds
        Returns:
        the string representation of the run duration, formatted as [hours]:[minutes]:[seconds]
